item-name.name: Item Name
item-name.desc: The name of the grid item.

max-columns.name: Max Columns
max-columns.desc: Max number of columns. -1 if unlimited.

max-rows.name: Max Rows
max-rows.desc: Max number of rows. -1 if unlimited.

vertical-padding.name: Vertical padding
vertical-padding.desc: Space after and before the right and left edges of the grid.

horizontal-padding.name: Horizontal padding
horizontal-padding.desc: Space after and before the top and bottom edges of the grid.

onrender0.description: Triggered when the grid view is built.

setdatabyjsonstring0.display-text: Set {my} data to [b]{0}[/b] with root key = {1}

setdatabyjsonobject.display-text: Set {my} data to [b]{0}[/b] with root key = {1}

at0.description: Get the value at a path.

count1.description: Get the number of keys in the data array.
